Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class TurnControllerTest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.TurnControllerTest
class TurnControllerTest
extends java.lang.Object
Class that deals with TurnController methods' tests. Its task is to verify correct method invocations because underlying method results has been already test in model related package.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) void activateProductionPaymentError()
    Covers payment error catch caused by player that selected wrong resource source to take his resources.
    (package private) void activateProductionResourceMismatch()
    Checks error consisting in a wrong selection of resources to be taken from warehouse.
    (package private) void activateProductionResourceMissing()
    Checks error in activate production action done by a player having not enough resources.
    (package private) void buyDevelopmentCard()
    Test that covers development card purchase and checks final occurrences in strongbox.
    (package private) void handleBuyDevCardMessageTest()
    Test of a standard buy development card action, ensuring that methods concerning action itself are called once.
    (package private) void handleEndTurnMessageTest()
    Test end turn message ensuring that nextTurn method of model is called once.
    (package private) void handleEndTurnMessageTestKO()
    Covers case of an EndTurnMessage sent by a player not in turn.
    (package private) void handleLeaderActionTest()
    Simple leader action test.
    (package private) void handleMoveMessageFaults()
    Covers error found in move action due to badly formatted message and wrong sender.
    (package private) void handleMoveMessageTest()
    Covers a basic move resources action.
    (package private) void handleTakeResourceFromMarketTest()
    Covers a take resources from market action with all possible outcomes.
    (package private) void handlingActivateNotOwnedProductionPowers()
    Covers error while attempting to activate a production power not available for the player.
    (package private) void handlingActivateProductionPowers()
    Checks a standard activate production action.
    (package private) void initializeMap()  
    (package private) void leaderActionFaults()
    Covers all possible errors found performing a leader action.
    (package private) void requiredPositioningTest()
    Checks how many resources require a placement after a take resources from market action.
    (package private) void secondPositioningFailedTest()
    Checks outcome of a positioning action failed twice.
